text: is a Japanese footballer. He is a defender. He signed for Albirex Niigata (S) in 2015 after graduating from Kansai University.http://www.albirex.com.sg/archives/12027/ He subsequently renewed his contract in 2016.http://www.albirex.com.sg/en/archives/17053/ He has played in Australia.http://www.albirex.com.sg/en/archives/23085/ ==Club career statistics== As of Jan 2, 2017 {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | League Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
